title: Mega Coaster: Get Ready for the Drop (360 Video)
description:
Strap in for the ride of a lifetime on a twisting steel behemoth of fun. This scream machine will push you into the back of your seat over 4,000 feet of track, with a half dozen inversions and speeds topping out over 60 miles an hour. This ride will feel more real than ever, save for the part where you have to wait in line.

Step into the Gillette VR Pressure Chamber:
http://www.discovery.com/pressurechamber

For more immersive experiences, head to http://DiscoveryVR.com or download the app for your iPhone or Android device.

iPhone: http://apple.co/1Kl14XA
Android: http://bit.ly/1Kl1bCy

Subscribe to Discovery:
http://bit.ly/SubscribeDiscovery

Join us on Facebook: 
https://www.facebook.com/Discovery

Follow on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/Discovery
